personalInfo.name: Shivani Jariwala
personalInfo.title: Software Engineer
personalInfo.summary: A passionate Software Engineer crafting elegant and efficient solutions.
personalInfo.description: I specialize in full-stack development with a focus on React, Node.js, and creating scalable cloud-based applications. Currently pursuing a Master's in Software Engineering at SJSU.

experience.title: Software Engineer
description: Revamped HR dashboard, Axis Bank's enrollment portal, and PWA using React.js, Node.js, and MySQL.
Developed Kafka-based pipelines and enhanced Visit Health app (3M+ users).
Engineered scalable AWS Lambda data pipelines, syncing 10K+ records/month.
Led backend SQL revamp, cutting load times and delivering client-facing Data Studio dashboards.

experience.title: Software Engineer Intern
description: Redesigned and implemented core full-stack modules using React.js, Redux, Node.js, and Express.
Developed automated tests with Mocha and Chai, reducing production regression bugs by 35%.

education.details: Relevant Coursework: DSA (C++), Database Management Systems, Operating Systems, Enterprise SW Platforms.

education.degree: Bachelor of Electronics and Communications Engineering
education.details: Graduated with a strong foundation in engineering principles and practices.
